fr:mainmatter.fr:p: I am a senior at Dalhousie University, doing research in Fixed-Parameter Tractable Algorithms and Fundamental Data Structures. In addition to my core work, I am also deeply interested in Programming Languages, Compilers, and Category Theory.

This website is a forest where I organize my thoughts, create notes on the topics I'm currently exploring and create links between related concepts. These notes are intended for my own use, so they may not always be easily understood by others. You can search my notes using Cmd + k.
